item.title: Setting Up Academic Theme
item.description: Academic theme is great, well-thought in design and popular with users. Below is a track record of mysite setup using Hugo and Academic. Precursor I’m migrating from a Jekyll-based CV theme to Academic. CV had a clean look and helped me to sort out my personal information, but it was not easily extensible. I did set it up once on Github Pages and rarely updated. As for site generators in general, Jekyll still looks a bit more popular than Hugo based on Github stars, but I like Hugo better, because of the following:
